Headline: Delays Affecting Howard-bound Red Line Trains
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from congestion after an earlier door problem at Jarvis. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from congestion after an earlier door problem at Jarvis. 

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
